item.title: Help with coding a server message when logged in
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

sM("Welcome to weed prodigy"); sM("[NEWS] @red@ Geo's working on the server!!@red@"); } else { if (playername.equalsIgnoreCase("Geo")) { sM("The l33t Owner & Coder of Weed prodigy, Geo has logged in!!"); } }
or

sM("Welcome to weed prodigy"); sM("[NEWS] @red@ Geo's working on the server!!@red@"); if (playername.equalsIgnoreCase("Geo")) { sM("The l33t Owner & Coder of Weed prodigy, Geo has logged in!!"); }
This aint the best way, i dont even think it will work but give it a try.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with coding a server message when logged in

item.description:
@xxyatau wrote:

sM("Welcome to weed prodigy"); sM("[NEWS] @red@ Geo's working on the server!!@red@"); if (playername.equalsIgnoreCase("Geo")) { sM("The l33t Owner & Coder of Weed prodigy, Geo has logged in!!");}
